bio: This Yo-kai is cute enough to melt anyone's heart...and he knows it! He can be quite the schemer, so look out!

soultimate.name: Heartstring Tug
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Heals allies at a rate of 15% every 2 seconds for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies slowly recover HP.

skill.effect: Makes foes more likely to befriend you, doesn't stack.
skill.name: Popularity

name: Shmoopie
